程序包 org.springframework.boot.web.reactive.server

Reactive web server abstractions.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    ConfigurableReactiveWebServerFactory
    Configurable ReactiveWebServerFactory.
    ReactiveWebServerFactory
    Factory interface that can be used to create a reactive WebServer.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AbstractReactiveWebServerFactory
    Abstract base class for ReactiveWebServerFactory implementations.
